dmca.title: Perfect 10 Says Links Earn a Zero
dmca.body:
Dear Sirs,

It has come to our attention that luclinks.com is linking to thousands
of stolen images, including hundreds of stolen images owned by Perfect
10 Magazine.

Please be advised that Perfect 10 Magazine has invested in excess of
$25,000,000 for our images.  We pay for our images and cannot compete
against entities that steal theirs.

In particular, Luclinks.com is linking to sites advertising images of
the following Perfect 10 models:

Nathalie De Nostuejouis, Julia Schultz, Lynn Thomas, Lissa Tombasova,
Inna Schevchenko, Caroline Stark, Adele Stephens, Irina Voronina,
Veronika Zemanova, Monica Zsibrita, Petra Havlasova, Rache Ter Horst,
Alexandria Karlsen, and Lucie Kotalova, among others.

This email is also being sent to ISPs that are hosting one or more
misappropriating websites on luclinks webpages, specifically
free-adult-hosting.net and sexplanets.com.

If your companies continue to link and/or host sites with
misappropriated content, we will sue you.  If you care about preserving
the rights of copyright holders, you need to ask the celebrity sites
that you are linking to and/or hosting to provide licenses or other
proof that they own the rights to their images.  Also please note that
the DMCA does not shield ISP with actual knowledge that they are hosting
sites with infringing content.

Thank you,


[Private]
Owner, Perfect 10 Magazine
